item.title: Using a PS3 wheel in PS4 with Gimx
item.description: I had a Driving Force GT wheel which is not supported and it doesn’t work in PS4, so it was basically covering in dust… but the community is awesome and there exists a project called gimx that enables support for old wheels in new systems like PS4, so I decided to give it a try, and after a few hours understanding what I needed and getting my hands dirty, it is working perfect with the DIY adapter (using a Chinese atmega32u4 + CP2102 converter) and a Raspberry PI 2.
